An XY individual with <math alttext="P D C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PDC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> deficiency and a homozygous XX individual with no family history of <math alttext="P D C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PDC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> deficiency have an XY offspring.
